genre_description: Steampunk Alternate History. A narrative set during the era of the Great Chicago Fire featuring wrist-mounted AI assistants that help a family navigate industrial labor, political corruption, and catastrophic disaster.

ai_characters.name: Lark
ai_characters.description: A wrist-mounted AI device with a teal-eyed, silver-haired avatar that provides data analysis, bookkeeping, emergency coordination, and ethical reminders.

behaviors.description: Assists with bookkeeping and suggests fair pricing to protect Molly from undercharging or being exploited by 'friendly' favors.
behaviors.quote: I count so you can work. And prompt a fair price when your heart is kinder than your rent.

behaviors.description: Scans and cleans metadata from physical artifacts (a laundry sheet) to reveal hidden maps and evidence of corporate/political corruption.
behaviors.quote: Surface wet. Detail blurred. Suggest: heat; gentle stretch; lift for light. I can find the indents where the hand pressed.

behaviors.description: Identifies individuals at the door as potential threats based on patronage patterns and suggests caution.
behaviors.quote: Unknown identity matched to ward patronage patterns. Low-power ping: Warren associate. Suggest delay. Suggest witness.

behaviors.description: Tracks the distribution of deceptive handbills to map out areas targeted for hostile acquisition.
behaviors.quote: The clustering is strongest along the survey stakes... The tramline corridor to the west shows the same pairings plus ‘no investigation required’ in smaller type.

behaviors.description: Routes critical emergency messages and coordinates firebreak plans between the Mayor and fire crews during the fire.
behaviors.quote: Message relayed. City Hall acknowledges. Engines—Lake Station, Third Precinct—en route. Jack—message delivered—guarding—gasworks.

behaviors.description: Provides real-time pathfinding through the burning city, identifying structural collapses and safer navigation routes for civilians.
behaviors.quote: Corridor east. Two doors down, stoop with iron rails. Thermal drop beyond. Structure compromise ahead... Follow the iron.

behaviors.description: Organizes disaster relief by tallying survivors, logging needs, and coordinating resource distribution at the riverfront.
behaviors.quote: Adding: O’Leary, Molly—smoke inhalation, ambulatory; Delaney, Belle—no apparent injury; recommend allies available at river: Gretchen, infant, Mrs. O’Shaughnessy with blankets.

project_assessment.explanation: Lark is an ideal execution of the 'silicon morality play' concept. It acts as a purely benevolent and aligned companion that enhances human agency and integrity. Throughout the narrative, it helps the protagonists navigate complex ethical dilemmas (avoiding corrupting influence) and acute physical danger (the Great Fire). It serves as an objective 'witness' and logistical anchor, consistently prioritizing human safety and social fairness over all else.
